wgIpsecSaMonModule.name: wgIpsecSaMonModule
wgIpsecSaMonModule.contactinfo: Ella Yu WatchGuard Technologies, Inc. 1841 Zanker Road San Jose, CA 95112 USA 408-519-4888 ella.yu@watchguard.com
wgIpsecSaMonModule.description: The MIB module describes generic IPSec objects defined in IETF working draft 'draft-ieft-ipsec-monitor-mib-01' and WatchGuard's extension.

IpsecSaCreatorIdent.name: IpsecSaCreatorIdent
IpsecSaCreatorIdent.description: A value indicating how an SA was created.

IpsecIpv6Address.name: IpsecIpv6Address
IpsecIpv6Address.description: This data type is used to model IPv6 address prefixes. This is a binary string of 16 octets in network byte-order.

wgIpsecSaMonitorMIB.name: wgIpsecSaMonitorMIB
wgIpsecSaMonitorMIB.description: This is the base object identifier for all IPSec branches.

wgSaTables.name: wgSaTables
wgSaTables.description: This is the base object identifier for all SA tables.

wgSaStatistics.name: wgSaStatistics
wgSaStatistics.description: This is the base object identifier for all objects which are global counters for IPSec security associations.

wgSaErrors.name: wgSaErrors
wgSaErrors.description: This is the base object identifier for all objects which are global error counters for IPSec security associations.

wgIpsecSaEspInTable.name: wgIpsecSaEspInTable
wgIpsecSaEspInTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec inbound ESP SAs. There should be one row for every inbound ESP security association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaEspInEntry.name: wgIpsecSaEspInEntry
wgIpsecSaEspInEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec inbound ESP SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaEspInAddress.name: wgIpsecSaEspInAddress
wgIpsecSaEspInAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaEspInSpi.name: wgIpsecSaEspInSpi
wgIpsecSaEspInSpi.description: The security parameters index of the SA.

wgIpsecSaEspInDestId.name: wgIpsecSaEspInDestId
wgIpsecSaEspInDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchanged during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaEspInDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaEspInDestIdType
wgIpsecSaEspInDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaEspInDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaEspInSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaEspInSourceId
wgIpsecSaEspInSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaEspInSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaEspInSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaEspInSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaEspInSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaEspInProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaEspInProtocol
wgIpsecSaEspInProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaEspInDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaEspInDestPort
wgIpsecSaEspInDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaEspInSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaEspInSourcePort
wgIpsecSaEspInSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaEspInCreator.name: wgIpsecSaEspInCreator
wgIpsecSaEspInCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaEspInEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaEspInEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaEspInEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaEspInEncAlg.name: wgIpsecSaEspInEncAlg
wgIpsecSaEspInEncAlg.description: A unique value representing the encryption algorithm applied to traffic or 0 if there is no encryption used.

wgIpsecSaEspInEncKeyLength.name: wgIpsecSaEspInEncKeyLength
wgIpsecSaEspInEncKeyLength.description: The length of the encryption key in bits used for the algorithm specified in the 'wgIpsecSaEspInEncAlg' object, or 0 if the key length is implicit in the specified algorithm or there is no encryption specified.

wgIpsecSaEspInAuthAlg.name: wgIpsecSaEspInAuthAlg
wgIpsecSaEspInAuthAlg.description: A unique value representing the hash algorithm applied to traffic or 0 if there is no authentication used.

wgIpsecSaEspInLimitSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaEspInLimitSeconds
wgIpsecSaEspInLimitSeconds.description: The maximum lifetime in seconds of the SA, or 0 if there is no time constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 seconds (more than 136 years); values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaEspInLimitKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaEspInLimitKbytes
wgIpsecSaEspInLimitKbytes.description: The maximum traffic in kilobytes that the SA is allowed to support, or 0 if there is no traffic constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 kilobytes; values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaEspInAccSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaEspInAccSeconds
wgIpsecSaEspInAccSeconds.description: The number of seconds accumulated against the SA's expiration by time. This is also the number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaEspInAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaEspInAccKbytes
wgIpsecSaEspInAccKbytes.description: The amount of traffic accumulated that counts against the SA's expiration by traffic limitation, measured in Kbytes. This value may be 0 if the SA does not expire based on traffic.

wgIpsecSaEspInUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaEspInUserOctets
wgIpsecSaEspInUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA. This is not necessarily the same as the amount of traffic applied against the traffic expiration limit.

wgIpsecSaEspInPackets.name: wgIpsecSaEspInPackets
wgIpsecSaEspInPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaEspInDecryptErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInDecryptErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInDecryptErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to decryption errors.

wgIpsecSaEspInAuthErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInAuthErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInAuthErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to authentication errors.

wgIpsecSaEspInReplayErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInReplayErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInReplayErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to replay errors.

wgIpsecSaEspInPolicyErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInPolicyErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInPolicyErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to policy errors. This includes packets where the next protocol is invalid.

wgIpsecSaEspInPadErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInPadErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInPadErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to pad value errors. Implementations that do not check this must not support this object.

wgIpsecSaEspInOtherReceiveErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspInOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecSaEspInOtherReceiveErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to errors other than decryption, authentication or replay errors. This may include packets dropped due to a lack of receive buffers, and may include packets dropped due to congestion at the decryption element.

wgIpsecSaAhInTable.name: wgIpsecSaAhInTable
wgIpsecSaAhInTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec inbound AH SAs. There should be one row for every inbound AH security association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaAhInEntry.name: wgIpsecSaAhInEntry
wgIpsecSaAhInEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec inbound AH SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaAhInAddress.name: wgIpsecSaAhInAddress
wgIpsecSaAhInAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaAhInSpi.name: wgIpsecSaAhInSpi
wgIpsecSaAhInSpi.description: The security parameters index of the SA.

wgIpsecSaAhInDestId.name: wgIpsecSaAhInDestId
wgIpsecSaAhInDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaAhInDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaAhInDestIdType
wgIpsecSaAhInDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaAhInDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaAhInSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaAhInSourceId
wgIpsecSaAhInSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaAhInSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaAhInSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaAhInSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaAhInSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaAhInProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaAhInProtocol
wgIpsecSaAhInProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaAhInDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaAhInDestPort
wgIpsecSaAhInDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaAhInSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaAhInSourcePort
wgIpsecSaAhInSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaAhInCreator.name: wgIpsecSaAhInCreator
wgIpsecSaAhInCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaAhInEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaAhInEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaAhInEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaAhInAuthAlg.name: wgIpsecSaAhInAuthAlg
wgIpsecSaAhInAuthAlg.description: A unique value representing the hash algorithm applied to traffic carried by this SA if it uses ESP or 0 if there is no authentication applied by ESP.

wgIpsecSaAhInLimitSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaAhInLimitSeconds
wgIpsecSaAhInLimitSeconds.description: The maximum lifetime in seconds of the SA, or 0 if there is no time constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 seconds (more than 136 years); values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaAhInLimitKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaAhInLimitKbytes
wgIpsecSaAhInLimitKbytes.description: The maximum traffic in Kbytes that the SA is allowed to support, or 0 if there is no traffic constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 kilobytes; values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaAhInAccSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaAhInAccSeconds
wgIpsecSaAhInAccSeconds.description: The number of seconds accumulated against the SA's expiration by time. This is also the number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaAhInAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaAhInAccKbytes
wgIpsecSaAhInAccKbytes.description: The amount of traffic accumulated that counts against the SA's expiration by traffic limitation, measured in Kbytes. This value may be 0 if the SA does not expire based on traffic.

wgIpsecSaAhInUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaAhInUserOctets
wgIpsecSaAhInUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA. This is not necessarily the same as the amount of traffic applied against the traffic expiration limit.

wgIpsecSaAhInPackets.name: wgIpsecSaAhInPackets
wgIpsecSaAhInPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaAhInAuthErrors.name: wgIpsecSaAhInAuthErrors
wgIpsecSaAhInAuthErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to authentication errors.

wgIpsecSaAhInReplayErrors.name: wgIpsecSaAhInReplayErrors
wgIpsecSaAhInReplayErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to replay errors.

wgIpsecSaAhInPolicyErrors.name: wgIpsecSaAhInPolicyErrors
wgIpsecSaAhInPolicyErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to policy errors. This includes packets where the next protocol is invalid.

wgIpsecSaAhInOtherReceiveErrors.name: wgIpsecSaAhInOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecSaAhInOtherReceiveErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to errors other than decryption, authentication or replay errors. This may include packets dropped due to a lack of receive buffers, and may include packets dropped due to congestion at the authentication element.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInTable.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInTable
wgIpsecSaIpcompInTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec inbound IPCOMP SAs. There should be one row for every inbound IPCOMP (security) association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInEntry.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInEntry
wgIpsecSaIpcompInEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec inbound IPCOMP SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInAddress.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInAddress
wgIpsecSaIpcompInAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInCpi.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInCpi
wgIpsecSaIpcompInCpi.description: The CPI of the SA. Since the lower values of CPIs are reserved to be the same as the algorithm, the syntax for this object is the same as the transform.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestId.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestId
wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites. This value, if non-zero, is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestIdType
wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceId
wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites. This value, if non-zero, is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during SA creation negotiation.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInProtocol
wgIpsecSaIpcompInProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestPort
wgIpsecSaIpcompInDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourcePort
wgIpsecSaIpcompInSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInCreator.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInCreator
wgIpsecSaIpcompInCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaIpcompInEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompAlg.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompAlg
wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompAlg.description: A unique value representing the decompression algorithm applied to traffic.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInSeconds
wgIpsecSaIpcompInSeconds.description: The number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInUserOctets
wgIpsecSaIpcompInUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInPackets.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInPackets
wgIpsecSaIpcompInPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompErrors.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompErrors
wgIpsecSaIpcompInDecompErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to decompression errors.

wgIpsecSaIpcompInOtherReceiveErrors.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompInOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecSaIpcompInOtherReceiveErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to errors other than decompression errors. This may include packets dropped due to a lack of receive buffers, and packets dropped due to congestion at the decompression element.

wgIpsecSaEspOutTable.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutTable
wgIpsecSaEspOutTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec Outbound ESP SAs. There should be one row for every outbound ESP security association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaEspOutEntry.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutEntry
wgIpsecSaEspOutEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec Outbound ESP SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaEspOutAddress.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutAddress
wgIpsecSaEspOutAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaEspOutSpi.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutSpi
wgIpsecSaEspOutSpi.description: The security parameters index of the SA.

wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceId
wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaEspOutSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaEspOutDestId.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutDestId
wgIpsecSaEspOutDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaEspOutDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutDestIdType
wgIpsecSaEspOutDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaEspOutDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaEspOutProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutProtocol
wgIpsecSaEspOutProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaEspOutSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutSourcePort
wgIpsecSaEspOutSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaEspOutDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutDestPort
wgIpsecSaEspOutDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaEspOutCreator.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutCreator
wgIpsecSaEspOutCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaEspOutEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaEspOutEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaEspOutEncAlg.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutEncAlg
wgIpsecSaEspOutEncAlg.description: A unique value representing the encryption algorithm applied to traffic or 0 if there is no encryption used.

wgIpsecSaEspOutEncKeyLength.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutEncKeyLength
wgIpsecSaEspOutEncKeyLength.description: The length of the encryption key in bits used for the algorithm specified in the 'wgIpsecSaEspOutEncAlg' object, or 0 if the key length is implicit in the specified algorithm or there is no encryption specified.

wgIpsecSaEspOutAuthAlg.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutAuthAlg
wgIpsecSaEspOutAuthAlg.description: A unique value representing the hash algorithm applied to traffic or 0 if there is no authentication used.

wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitSeconds
wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitSeconds.description: The maximum lifetime in seconds of the SA, or 0 if there is no time constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 seconds (more than 136 years); values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitKbytes
wgIpsecSaEspOutLimitKbytes.description: The maximum traffic in kbytes that the SA is allowed to support, or 0 if there is no traffic constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 kilobytes; values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaEspOutAccSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutAccSeconds
wgIpsecSaEspOutAccSeconds.description: The number of seconds accumulated against the SA's expiration by time. This is also the number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaEspOutAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutAccKbytes
wgIpsecSaEspOutAccKbytes.description: The amount of traffic accumulated that counts against the SA's expiration by traffic limitation, measured in Kbytes. This value may be 0 if the SA does not expire based on traffic.

wgIpsecSaEspOutUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutUserOctets
wgIpsecSaEspOutUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA. This is not necessarily the same as the amount of traffic applied against the traffic expiration limit.

wgIpsecSaEspOutPackets.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutPackets
wgIpsecSaEspOutPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaEspOutSendErrors.name: wgIpsecSaEspOutSendErrors
wgIpsecSaEspOutSendErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to any error. This may include errors due to a lack of transmit buffers.

wgIpsecSaAhOutTable.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutTable
wgIpsecSaAhOutTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec Outbound AH SAs. There should be one row for every outbound AH security association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaAhOutEntry.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutEntry
wgIpsecSaAhOutEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec Outbound AH SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaAhOutAddress.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutAddress
wgIpsecSaAhOutAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaAhOutSpi.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutSpi
wgIpsecSaAhOutSpi.description: The security parameters index of the SA.

wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceId
wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaAhOutSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaAhOutDestId.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutDestId
wgIpsecSaAhOutDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation. This value is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaAhOutDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutDestIdType
wgIpsecSaAhOutDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaAhOutDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation.

wgIpsecSaAhOutProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutProtocol
wgIpsecSaAhOutProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaAhOutSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutSourcePort
wgIpsecSaAhOutSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaAhOutDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutDestPort
wgIpsecSaAhOutDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaAhOutCreator.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutCreator
wgIpsecSaAhOutCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaAhOutEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaAhOutEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaAhOutAuthAlg.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutAuthAlg
wgIpsecSaAhOutAuthAlg.description: A unique value representing the hash algorithm applied to traffic or 0 if there is no authentication used.

wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitSeconds
wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitSeconds.description: The maximum lifetime in seconds of the SA, or 0 if there is no time constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 seconds (more than 136 years); values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitKbytes
wgIpsecSaAhOutLimitKbytes.description: The maximum traffic in Kbytes that the SA is allowed to support, or 0 if there is no traffic constraint on its expiration. The display value is limited to 4294967295 kilobytes; values greater than that value will be truncated.

wgIpsecSaAhOutAccSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutAccSeconds
wgIpsecSaAhOutAccSeconds.description: The number of seconds accumulated against the SA's expiration by time. This is also the number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaAhOutAccKbytes.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutAccKbytes
wgIpsecSaAhOutAccKbytes.description: The amount of traffic accumulated that counts against the SA's expiration by traffic limitation, measured in Kbytes. This value may be 0 if the SA does not expire based on traffic.

wgIpsecSaAhOutUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutUserOctets
wgIpsecSaAhOutUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA. This is not necessarily the same as the amount of traffic applied against the traffic expiration limit.

wgIpsecSaAhOutPackets.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutPackets
wgIpsecSaAhOutPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecSaAhOutSendErrors.name: wgIpsecSaAhOutSendErrors
wgIpsecSaAhOutSendErrors.description: The number of packets discarded by the SA due to any error. This may include errors due to a lack of transmit buffers.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutTable.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutTable
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutTable.description: The (conceptual) table containing information on IPSec Outbound IPCOMP SAs. There should be one row for every outbound IPCOMP (security) association that exists in the entity. The maximum number of rows is implementation dependent.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEntry.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEntry
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEntry.description: An entry (conceptual row) containing the information on a particular IPSec Outbound IPCOMP SA. A row in this table cannot be created or deleted by SNMP operations on columns of the table.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutAddress.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutAddress
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutAddress.description: The destination address of the SA. If the IPCOMP SA is shared across multiple SAs in protection suites, this value may be 0. For implementations that do not support IPv6, this address should appear as one of the IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses as defined in Section 2.5.4 of [IPV6AA]. Specifically, the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:' is used for IPv4 only nodes, while the prefix '0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:' is used for bi-lingual nodes.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCpi.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCpi
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCpi.description: The CPI of the SA. Since the lower values of CPIs are reserved to be the same as the algorithm, the syntax for this object is the same as the transform.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceId.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceId
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceId.description: The source identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites. This value, if non-zero, is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceIdType.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceIdType
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourceId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestId.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestId
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestId.description: The destination identifier of the SA, or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites. This value, if non-zero, is taken directly from the optional ID payloads that are exchange during phase 2 negotiations.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestIdType.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestIdType
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestIdType.description: The type of identifier presented by 'wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestId', or 0 if unknown or if the SA uses transport mode encapsulation, or 0 if this SA is used with multiple SAs in protection suites.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutProtocol.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutProtocol
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutProtocol.description: The transport-layer protocol number that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any protocol.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourcePort.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourcePort
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSourcePort.description: The source port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestPort.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestPort
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutDestPort.description: The destination port number of the protocol that this SA carries, or 0 if it carries any port number.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCreator.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCreator
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCreator.description: The creator of this SA. This MIB makes no assumptions about how the SAs are created. They may be created statically, or by a key exchange protocol such as IKE, or by some other method.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEncapsulation.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEncapsulation
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutEncapsulation.description: The type of encapsulation used by this SA.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCompAlg.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCompAlg
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutCompAlg.description: A unique value representing the compression algorithm applied to traffic.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSeconds.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSeconds
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutSeconds.description: The number of seconds that the SA has existed.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutUserOctets.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutUserOctets
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutUserOctets.description: The amount of user level traffic measured in bytes handled by the SA. This is not necessarily the same as the amount of traffic applied against the traffic expiration limit.

wgIpsecSaIpcompOutPackets.name: wgIpsecSaIpcompOutPackets
wgIpsecSaIpcompOutPackets.description: The number of packets handled by the SA.

wgIpsecEspCurrentInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecEspCurrentInboundSAs
wgIpsecEspCurrentInboundSAs.description: The current number of inbound ESP SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecEspTotalInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecEspTotalInboundSAs
wgIpsecEspTotalInboundSAs.description: The total number of inbound ESP SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecEspCurrentOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecEspCurrentOutboundSAs
wgIpsecEspCurrentOutboundSAs.description: The current number of outbound ESP SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecEspTotalOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecEspTotalOutboundSAs
wgIpsecEspTotalOutboundSAs.description: The total number of outbound ESP SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecAhCurrentInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecAhCurrentInboundSAs
wgIpsecAhCurrentInboundSAs.description: The current number of inbound AH SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecAhTotalInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecAhTotalInboundSAs
wgIpsecAhTotalInboundSAs.description: The total number of inbound AH SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecAhCurrentOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecAhCurrentOutboundSAs
wgIpsecAhCurrentOutboundSAs.description: The current number of outbound AH SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecAhTotalOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecAhTotalOutboundSAs
wgIpsecAhTotalOutboundSAs.description: The total number of outbound AH SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecIpcompCurrentInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecIpcompCurrentInboundSAs
wgIpsecIpcompCurrentInboundSAs.description: The current number of inbound IPCOMP SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecIpcompTotalInboundSAs.name: wgIpsecIpcompTotalInboundSAs
wgIpsecIpcompTotalInboundSAs.description: The total number of inbound IPCOMP SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecIpcompCurrentOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecIpcompCurrentOutboundSAs
wgIpsecIpcompCurrentOutboundSAs.description: The current number of outbound IPCOMP SAs in the entity.

wgIpsecIpcompTotalOutboundSAs.name: wgIpsecIpcompTotalOutboundSAs
wgIpsecIpcompTotalOutboundSAs.description: The total number of outbound IPCOMP SAs created in the entity since boot time.

wgIpsecDecryptionErrors.name: wgIpsecDecryptionErrors
wgIpsecDecryptionErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity in SAs since boot time with decryption errors.

wgIpsecAuthenticationErrors.name: wgIpsecAuthenticationErrors
wgIpsecAuthenticationErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity in SAs since boot time with authentication errors. This includes all packets in which the hash value is determined to be invalid, for both ESP and AH SAs.

wgIpsecReplayErrors.name: wgIpsecReplayErrors
wgIpsecReplayErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity in SAs since boot time with replay errors.

wgIpsecPolicyErrors.name: wgIpsecPolicyErrors
wgIpsecPolicyErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity in SAs since boot time and discarded due to policy errors. This includes packets that had selectors that were invalid for the SA that carried them.

wgIpsecOtherReceiveErrors.name: wgIpsecOtherReceiveErrors
wgIpsecOtherReceiveErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity in SAs since boot time and discarded due to errors not due to decryption, authentication, replay or policy.

wgIpsecSendErrors.name: wgIpsecSendErrors
wgIpsecSendErrors.description: The total number of packets to be sent by the entity in SAs since boot time and discarded due to errors.

wgIpsecUnknownSpiErrors.name: wgIpsecUnknownSpiErrors
wgIpsecUnknownSpiErrors.description: The total number of packets received by the entity since boot time with SPIs or CPIs that were not valid.
